name: Just a Minute (Bleg)
description:
Space travel only takes a minute!

However, time moves differently in space.

A lot can go wrong in 60 seconds...

Controls:

  • Left click a crew mate to select them, then:
    • Left click a room to make them move there
    • Left click a fire in the room to make them put it out
    • Left click a lock in an adjacent room to unlock it
    • Left click elsewhere to de-select the them
  • Left click the clock (bottom right) to advance time by one second

Guide:

Fly your spaceship to your destination and survive fires, lockdowns, and space pirates! 
Every 10 seconds a bad thing will happen; move your crew one room at a time to take care of problems before they get out of hand!

Your ship's distance and health are tracked at the top of the screen. 

Fires will hurt your ship's health.
Locks will block your path.
Pirates will move right-ward, and can cause game over if they get to the engine room - they'll fight your crew mates, and lose if outnumbered.

Can you make it to the end of your trip safely?
